channel.title: Blog on Ellisa Adams
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Ellisa Adams

item.title: You have to start somewhere...
item.description: “There’s something delicious about writing those first few words of a story. You can never quite tell where they will take you.

item.title: The start of my journey!
item.description: Big   a little smaller   a bullet another bullet a number another number Why   My husband is awesome and I really love him!
